description: Fols. 68; 19.2 x 14.4 cm.; written surface 14.5 x 8.2 cm.; 15 lines to page; on glazed Arabic paper; in naskhi; with catchwords; entries in red. A commentary on a magical poem by Thābit ibn Sulaymān. Beg.: بسم الله الرحمن الرحىم. الحمد لله خالق عقول نفوس ارواح الروحانىة ومفضلها في هىاکل محسوس الاشباح الجسمانىة Colophon: تم ذلك بحمد الله وعونه وحسن توفىقه وصلى الله تعالى على سىدنا محمد وعلى آله وصحبه وسلم کثىرًا A few marginal notes. MS in good condition but worm-eaten; Arabic leather binding with flap. Probably from the XVIIth century. Acquired from Bārūdī, Beirūt, A.D. 1925.
author: Ibn Arfaʻ Raʼs, ʻAli ibn Mūsa, d. 1197
title: al-Jihāt fī ʻilm al-tawajjuhāt fī sharḥ qaṣīdat Thābit ibn Sulaymān.
creator: Ibn Arfaʻ Raʼs, ʻAli ibn Mūsa, d. 1197
subject: Thābit ibn Sulaymān.—Qaṣīdah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
